mapper.delete: DELETE FROM resume WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId} AND user_name = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET application_year = #{resume.applicationYear}, application_type=#{resume.applicationType}, company_name=#{resume.companyName}, half_type=#{resume.halfType}, pass_flag=#{resume.passFlag}, finish_flag=#{resume.finishFlag} WHERE resume_id = #{resume.resumeId} AND user_name = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume (user_name, application_year, application_type, company_name, half_type, pass_flag, finish_flag) VALUES (#{username}, #{applicationYear}, #{applicationType}, #{companyName}, #{halfType}, #{passFlag}, #{finishFlag})
